newsitem.title: USA: WavePhore to acquire Paracel Online.
newsitem.headline: WavePhore to acquire Paracel Online.

text.p: WavePhore Inc on Thursday said it intends to acquire privately-held Paracel Online Systems Inc for $3 million at closing, another $6 million in 180 days, and future considerations based upon performance.
Paracel Online systems is a unit of Paracel Inc, which develops technologies for high-precision data analysis, data mining and data filtering.
WavePhore's Newscast product lines will incorporate Paracel's NewsCenter online information delivery platform and the Fast Data Finder system, its filtering technology.
WavePhore said the combined operation will provide customized, real-time news and information to corporate customers.
